price: Tàbí wọn kò wòye sí bí Allāhu ti ṣe bẹ̀rẹ̀ ẹ̀dá ni? Lẹ́yìn náà, O máa dá a padà (sí ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀). Dájúdájú ìyẹn rọrùn fún Allāhu.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw kayfa yub'di-u al-lahu al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu inna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīrun
